name: MSCRMUpdateWebResource
description: Updates Web Resources from source control on a target PowerApps/CDS/Dynamics 365 environment
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: The web resources must be present in the target environment. This task only updates the contents.

options.developerToolkit: Use developer toolkit Web Resource project file as mapping
options.jsonMapping: Use JSON mapping for Web Resource folder

inputs.name: webResourceProjectPath
inputs.label: Web Resource Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of web resources project created using developer toolkit

inputs.name: webResourceFolderPath
inputs.label: Web Resource Folder Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of folder contains web resources.

inputs.name: webResourceJsonMappingPath
inputs.label: Web Resource JSON mapping
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of JSON mapping file. JSON mapping e.g. {</br>  'webresources': [</br>    {</br>      'root': '',</br>      'files': [</br>        {</br>          'uniquename': 'new_/js/somefile.js',</br>          'file': 'js\somefile.js',</br>          'description': ''</br>        },</br>        {</br>          'uniquename': 'new_/html/HtmlPage.htm',</br>          'file': 'html\HtmlPage.htm',</br>          'description': ''</br>        }</br>      ]</br>    }</br>  ]</br>}

inputs.name: searchPattern
inputs.label: Comma separated list of search filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of search filters, e.g. *.js, *namepart*.html

inputs.name: regExToMatchUniqueName
inputs.label: Regular expression to match unique name of web resource
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression to match unique name of web resource. Please use {filename} placeholder to relate file name and unique name. E.g. new_.*?{filename} which will match string like new_someResource. Considering 'new_' is prefix of web resource and someResource was replaced dynamically from {filename}

inputs.name: includeFileExtensionForUniqueName
inputs.label: Include file extension to match unique name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include file extension to match file name and unique name.

inputs.name: failIfWebResourceNotFound
inputs.label: Exit with error if web resource not found in CRM
inputs.helpMarkDown: Throw an error if there were web resources not found in CRM during processing

inputs.name: publish
inputs.label: Publish Web Resources
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to publish web resources after update

inputs.name: solutionName
inputs.label: CRM solution name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Unique name of solution to which web resources has to be register. Solution name will be used only for 'Deployment Type' is 'Use Web Resource folder'.
